author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1665963374}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

review:
背景に四角が並ぶ画面が良い

内容はシンプルで緑四角を上下左右に動かして青四角に到達すること。
自機は進んだら壁(白四角)に当たるまで止まれません。
進んでいくとぶつかってはいけない四角や動く四角、消えたり現れたりする四角と色々考えられてます。

詳しく書いてみたけど本当にこれだけ。
クリア後の特典？も無いしクリアしたら終わりです。
ぼーっとしながら気楽にできるし個人的に好きだが面白いのは最初だけだしお勧めできるかと言われたら…

author: {'steamid': '76561198066684647', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1531074612}
review:
[h1] Просто мусор[/h1]

Очередная игра, которая вышла в 2017 году от очередного нахлебника, который решил в Стиме наварится на карточках. Честно говоря, устал уже возвращаться к одним и тем же проблемам и говорить одно и тоже. Мне уже самому надоело натыкаться на подобное. Даже на Конгрегейте, где подобные игры бесплатно раздают, и то уже таких игр никто не выкладывает, ибо стыдно.  Перед нами самая простая мини-игра, где нужно кубиком дойти до выхода,соприкасаясь к другим кубам. Ничего сложного, подобные вещи я видел и раньше. Причем один-в-один. Зачем делать простую и избитую мини-игру, никак не улучшая игровой процесс? Да просто запулить в Стим, и навариваться на карточках.

[u]Итог[/u]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1126193393

Просто очередной мусор, который даже по казуальным играм и близко не проходит гост в нынешнем 2018 году. Не играйте в это и не покупайте. Пусть даже если и продается за копейки.

[i]P.s: если этот обзор был для Вас полезен ставьте лайк, это лучшая награда для меня, ибо без Вас, эти обзоры не имеют смысла) Увидимся в моей группе - [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28776273/ ] Обзоры онлайн [/url][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197997873804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1490102273}
review:
On pourrait se dire qu'à force de franchir niveaux après niveaux, la difficulté irait en grandissant jusqu'à ce qu'on galère comme dans un bon jeu de réflexion, au moins d'une petite galère aigre douce... mais non, la simplicité ici est telle que le défit est absent.

Pour le principe du jeu, la vidéo suffit en elle même... si vous regardez le jeu depuis un accès à la connectivité trop laborieuse pour la visionner, alors, j'explique :

Le plateau de jeu est une toile noire sur laquelle sont placé des carrés blancs pour la plupart, ainsi que votre "personnage" lui même un carré pouvant se déplacer en quatre directions (haut, bas, gauche et droite) et dont la course ne peut être stoppé que par collision avec un autre carré.

Le but est d'atteindre un carré en particulier que l'on doit toucher pour passer au niveau suivant.

On aurait donc pu imaginer un défi, mais plusieurs solutions pourront être abordé pour un seul niveau, bien souvent... et ce dernier commentaire ne fait que souligner le premier : 

"difficulté ? c'est quoi ? passes moi un dico !"

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1502382486}
review:
브레이크 없는 우주선을 타고 포탈로 가자!

물론 그냥 꾸며낸 이야기입니다.
플레이어는 네모네모한 박스를 네모네모한 포탈로 이동시켜야합니다.
이동 제한 없음, 제한 시간 없음. 난이도도 나름 평범.

네모는 정지가 불가능하며, 앞에 단단한 벽이 있어야만 멈출 수 있습니다.
키보드 방향키로 달려갈 방향을 지정해줄 수 있습니다.
화면을 벗어나면 해당 스테이지 리셋!!

등장하는 네모 오브젝트는 초록색/ 하얀색/ 겹쳐진 푸른색/ 깜빡이는 노란색/ 
1회성 붉은색/ 깜빡이는 초록색/  움직이는 파란색 이렇게 존재합니다.

초록색은 당연히 플레이어이고, 겹쳐진 푸른색은 포탈이죠.
하얀색은 가장 기본적인 오브젝트로, 초록색이 멈추게 하는 용도로 사용됩니다.
노란색은 등장했다 사라졌다를 반복합니다. 충돌해서 멈추거나, 사라졌을때 지나갈 수 있죠.
붉은색은 1회성 오브젝트입니다. 충돌하면 초록색이 멈추면서 붉은색이 사라지죠.

깜빡이는 초록색의 경우, 등장했다 사라졌다 라는 것은 노란색과 동일하지만,
충돌하게 되면 게임이 처음부터 다시 시작하는 리셋 상태가 됩니다.
움직이는 파란색도 정해진 범위를 왔다갔다하며, 충돌하면 리셋시켜버리죠.

방해하는 오브젝트를 피하면서 포탈로 이동하면 됩니다.
참고로, 노란색과 붉은색 등이 보인다고 모두 사용해야한다! 라고 생각하지 않는게 좋습니다.
오히려 이걸 이용해야해 라는 심리를 이용해 잘못된 길로 유도하는 경우가 있죠.

아쉬운 점
-너무 짧은 플레이

author: {'steamid': '76561197963699878', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1490269333}
review:
Honestly one of the greatest games that I have ever played in all my years of gaming. This game started off rough with an uncomplete game (still amazing) yet the developer desided, "you know what lets make this game so much better, and not make anyone pay extra for it" so they did just that, they scrapped the first game and completly remade the game without asking players for a single dime in return, all they wanted was feedback. With such a small team of devs it continues to awe me that they are still able to push out a new update when ever they can, if this isnt great service I dont know what is.

**needs a feature that counts how many moves you made**

author: {'steamid': '76561198033406565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1514231513}
review:
As the game states, you use simple logic to move your green block through the level to make it touch the goal block.  It mixes in other types of blocks that have differnt properties when your green block touches them as you progress through the later game levels.

Total length of game is on the short side.  A friend and I both purchsed it, loaded it up, and started the first level at the same time time.  He finshed the game at about 30 minutes of total play time, and I was a few minutes behind him.

There isn't much of a soundtrack, with only an on/off setting for the background music in game.  So, dependng on your OS sound playback settings, the game may come accross quite loud until you adjust it down.  Also, the game first loads up with the sound turned off, so make sure to hit the sound icon on the main start screen if you want it on before starting the levels.

Overall, the game is a bit on the easy side, as far as puzzel games go, with the total length of the game leaving something more to be desired.  It also had a few levels that were less puzzel based and more so just hammering the direction key until you timed correctly moving your block through at the right time.

For the price, it made for an ok time.  I recommend grabbing a friend and seeing who can finish all the levels faster to get more out of this game.
